title: CUPB Notification 2025 - Walk-in interview for Project Research Scientist I Posts
description: The Central University of Punjab, Bathinda (CUPB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Research Scientist-I Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M. Pharm., Ph.D. can apply for the CUPB Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, select...
